column5: We leave next Friday, I'm trying to figure out what will taste the best some pancakes with fresh blueberries and good coffee or hot walleye fillets cooked with the warm glow of a couple of Crown Royal Bombers. What a dilema. I wish my job gave me such demanding choices to make. Hope everyone had a good trip or will have a good trip this year.
Lunker's got it right. Asking which one is like asking "Ginger or Maryann?" Same answer...BOTH.

A few years back while guiding I did a shore lunch for my clients and mistakenly used blueberry pancake mix as a batter. The fish came out tasting like giant crispy blueberry fritters. I thought it was hideous but they liked it.Best of both worlds.

On the morning I left home on my last fishing trip I was in my garden at first light, picking: blueberries, tomatoes, sweet corn, okra, cukes, and green peppers for our stay up yonder. I like fresh blueberries on top of my pancakes, rather than in the batter.
I would say it depends on what time of day we are talking about ????????
Unless it's a solo trip, I'd say flip a coin. Heads goes to get the 'eyes and tails goes berry pickin'. See ya in the cabin about 5:00 for drinks and dinner!
Too many Crown Royal bombers before making the batter Mike?
